list.name: flight_id
list.query: SELECT flight_id FROM baggage.flight_kpis WHERE dep_time BETWEEN now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR AND now() + INTERVAL 6 HOUR ORDER BY dep_time LIMIT 100

targets.query: SELECT bag_id, itinerary_id, airport, event_type, event_time, leg_index FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE flight_id='${flight_id}' AND event_type != 'LoadedOnAircraft' ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 200
SELECT bag_id, event_type, airport, event_time, ingest_time, reader_type FROM baggage.events WHERE flight_id='${flight_id}' ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 200
